article.title: Raytheon Awarded GPS Operational Control System Funds
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: Raytheon Co., Aurora, Colo., is being awarded a $7,242,477 contract modification for support of the Global Positioning Systems, Next Generation Operational Control System (OCX). The contracting activity is the Space and Missile Systems Center, Los Angeles Air Force Base, Calif.
